body_html: @rongjiecomputer the update to 2.0.0 needs to go in quickly cuz it fixes some CVEs in the current version. That version passes all the tests but I don't really know how to do the SIMD stuff on windows. It looks like 2.0.0 adds quite a bit of support tho so ideally could you rebase this on top of the 2.0.0 one to enable the windows SIMD stuff?
